articles.title: There’s still hope that the mysterious origin of the coronavirus will be uncovered - BGR
articles.description: The World Health Organization’s delayed investigation of the novel coronavirus’s origin in China has caused controversy, but scientists still expect the investigation to yield results. The WHO and China agreed on how to proceed with the coronavirus origin sea…
articles.content: • The World Health Organization’s delayed investigation of the novel coronavirus’s origin in China has caused controversy, but scientists still expect the investigation to yield results.

articles.title: China suggests Italy may be the birthplace of COVID-19 pandemic - Fox News
articles.description: China is using a new study about the early, hidden spread of coronavirus in Italy to cast doubt on the firmly held assumption that the Asian nation was the birthplace of the pandemic, according to reports.
